answers.answer: That sounds like ligament pain to me. But I would make sure you let your doctor or midwife know. Pain on the right side can also be a symptom of preeclampsia.

question: im about 22 weeks 5 days. Today when I was walking around the mall I sudden got this pain/stretching feeling on my right side. It's almost the same achey feeling if you had just went running for the first time in awhile (I think that's called stitches) except rather it be in my rib area it's kinda in the middle on my right side. It hurt so bad I felt like I needed to sit down for a few . It doesn't last too long, it passes but it's uncomfortable. Has anyone else experienced this? Is this round ligament pain?
title: 22 weeks Sudden pain right side
